newsitem.title: UK: SQUASH-DETACHED RETINA RULES OUT BRITISH CHAMPION.
newsitem.headline: SQUASH-DETACHED RETINA RULES OUT BRITISH CHAMPION.

text.p: British squash champion Mark Cairns has withdrawn from this week's Super Series finals in Hatfield, England following emergency surgery for a detached retina.
The operation last week was said to be successful but Cairns accepted his doctor's advice not to play.
Pakistan's Zubair Jahan Khan has replaced Cairns and will play world champion and compatriot Jansher Khan in the first round.
